title: 'Our Man in Havana' covers Pope's historic visit
content:
Florida Keys NewsMonday, September 21, 2015'Our Man in Havana' covers Pope's historic visitBY Kay Harris Key West Citizen
HAVANA — Key West Citizen photographer Rob O'Neal, also known as "Our Man in Havana," publishing weekly snapshots of life in Cuba, visited our nearest neighbor this weekend to capture various moments with Pope Francis.
O'Neal said the trip was "grueling but totally rewarding," speaking from Havana on Sunday. "This is the biggest thing I've ever done," he said, as covering the...
